select ai.id, ai.staff_id, ai.put_take_date, ai.out_take_date, si.code as staffCode, si.name as staffName, ei.name as enterpriseName, ei.images as enterpriseImages, di.dept_name, poi.name as positionName from attendance_info ai left join staff_info si on (si.id = ai.staff_id) left join enterprise_info ei on (ei.id = si.enterprise_id) left join dept_info di on (di.id = si.dept_id) left join position_info poi on (poi.id = si.position_id) where 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{attendanceInfo.staffName},'%')
AND si.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{attendanceInfo.staffId},'%')
AND ei.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{attendanceInfo.staffId},'%')
order by ai.put_take_date desc
